page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT SURVEY - Male
page.content: No. of Fathers employed: 100% All Fathers are employed full-time. {************************************* {Types of Employment} Clerical: 2 Manual: 5 Educational: 4 Agricultural: 1 Managerial: 15 Engineering: 2 Pilot: 1 Manufacturer: 1 Self-employed: 8 Plumber: 1 {Travel to Employment} Living at work: 5 Mileage from Employment (return):- 1-5: 2 20-50: 4 5-10: 9 Over 50 - 4 10-20: 10 Avg. wkly mileage: 348 {Length of Employment in years } Less than 1: 3 1-5: 8 5-10: 12 10-20: 12 More than 20: 3 {Work pattern Day: 33 Night: 3 Shift: 2 {These results are based on 42 or 72% {of surveys returned to Class 2. }
